thread.title: Peter Barker, CEO Newtecpoly Pty Ltd
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Peter Barker, CEO Newtecpoly Pty Ltd

author: Peter Barker, CEO Newtecpoly Pty Ltd
title: Peter Barker, CEO Newtecpoly Pty Ltd
text:
Sam,
Your attention to detail and commitment to customer service is both awesome and very much appreciated.
I enjoy feeling like a valued customer and friend of your business whenever we speak.
Keep up the great work.
